resources.string: Must have between 8 and 14 characters and contain at least one uppercase, one lowercase, one digit and one symbol
A user with the provided email already exists

Your BMI is on a low value, which means that your weight is below the recommended for your height. This can weaken your immune system and lead yo illnesses. You should see your doctor or nutritionist to gain weight.
Your BMI is on a normal value, which means that you are on a normal weight for your height. You can keep your eating habits and maintain a regular practice of physical exercise.

Your BMI is on a high value, which means that your weight is above the recommended for your height. This increases the risk for cardiovascular diseases. You should see your doctor or nutritionist to lose weight.
Your Abdominal Perimeter is on a normal value, which means you have low risk of getting cardiovascular diseases, such as diabetes type II, high cholesterol and hypertension.

Your Abdominal Perimeter is on an augmented value, which means you have intermediate risk of getting cardiovascular diseases, such as diabetes type II, high cholesterol and hypertension. You should watch your eating habits and maintain a regular practice of physical exercise to lower your Abdominal Perimeter.

Your Abdominal Perimeter is on an high value, which means you have high risk of getting cardiovascular diseases, such as diabetes type II, high cholesterol and hypertension. This is a concerning value, so you should see your doctor to improve your health.

The Abdominal Perimeter values vary according to gender. In Males the interval is 94-102cm and in Femaled the interval is 80-88cm. Please, contact your doctor for more info about your Abdominal Perimeter.

Your Blood Sugar average is on a low value, which means that the glucose in your blood is being on a low level for the previous 2 to 3 months. You should see your doctor or nutritionist to increase your Blood Sugar, so you can gain more energy.
Your Blood Sugar average is on a normal value, which means that the glucose in your blood is being on a good level for the previous 2 to 3 months.

Your Blood Sugar average is on a high value, which means that the glucose in your blood is being on a high level for the previous 2 to 3 months. You should see your doctor, because this might indicate that you have Diabetes. If you are already diagnosed with Diabetes, maintain the recommendations of your doctor, as well as a regular practice of physical exercise.

Your Blood Pressure is on a low value, which means that your blood is circulating exerting little pressure. This causes low irrigation on your body, which can lead to Dizziness, Weakness and Stroke. You should see your doctor to increase your Blood Pressure.

Your Blood Pressure is on a normal value, which means that your blood is circulating exerting the necessary pressure. You have low risk of suffering a Stroke. You can keep your heating habits and maintain a regular practice of physical exercise.

Your Blood Pressure is on a high value, which means that your blood is circulating exerting exaggerated pressure. This causes the heart to work harder, i.e you have high risk of suffering a Stroke. You should see your doctor to decrease your Blood Pressure.
Your Heart Rate is on a low value, which means that your heart is not pumping enough for your body. This can lead to death. You should see your doctor to increase your Heart Rate.
Your Heart Rate is on a normal value, which means that your heart is pumping enough for your body. You can keep your heating habits and maintain a regular practice of physical exercise.

Your Heart Rate is on a high value, which means that your heart is pumping harder than the recommended for your body. This can lead yo Hypertension, which is a risk factor for cardiovascular diseases. You should see your doctor to control your Heart Rate.

Your Heart Rate is on an extremely high value, which means that your heart is pumping way too harder than the recommended for your body. You have extreme high risk of suffering a Heart Attack, so call 911 IMMEDIATELY.
